thread.title: BRIEF-Digital Ally Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.63

title: BRIEF-Digital Ally Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.63
text:
April 13, 2018 / 12:36 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Digital Ally Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.63 Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - Digital Ally Inc: * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $2.9 MILLION VERSUS $3.4 MILLION 
* BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS INITIATED A REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES 
* RESULT OF STRATEGIC REVIEW MAY ALSO INCLUDE CONTINUED IMPLEMENTATION OF ITS BUSINESS PLAN WITH ADDITIONAL DEBT OR EQUITY FINANCING 
* RETAINED ROTH CAPITAL PARTNERS TO ASSIST IN STRATEGIC REVIEW AND PROCESS 
* TERM LIQUIDITY AND OPERATIONAL ISSUES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
